name: Journey To Redemption
description:
Journey To Redemption is a first person puzzle-game. You are Cornelius Allen, the only survivor of a plane crash on an island with a labyrinth in the middle. Explore this misterious place, solve its enigmas and survive its deadly traps. Find out Cornelius story collecting all the pages of his diary hidden in the map and reach the center of the labyrinth to know the truth.

---

Credits:

Design and programming by Edoardo Demuru, Davide Cervella, Fabrizio Corelli and Salvatore Gurzì

Project developed for VR class of Polytechnic University of Turin

---
